description: NotePlan productivity hooks for workflow suggestions

hooks.prompt: Check if the current working directory appears to be a NotePlan data directory (contains Calendar/, Notes/, or CLAUDE.md mentioning NotePlan). If so, output a brief reminder about available NotePlan workflows. Keep it under 100 words. Format: 'NotePlan detected. Available workflows: /noteplan:weekly-plan (Monday), /noteplan:weekly-review (Friday), /noteplan:file-inbox, /noteplan:scan-past-due, /noteplan:analyze-sessions.' If not in NotePlan directory, output nothing.
